heading: **Green Faith**
**The Old Faith**
**Source** [Pathfinder #75: Demon's Heresy pg. 64](source:Pathfinder #75: Demon's Heresy)
**Pathfinder Wiki** [Green Faith](http://www.pathfinderwiki.com/wiki/Green Faith)
details: **Areas of Concern** Air, beast, earth, fire, water
for_followers: [Cultivator (Bard)](unknown:Cultivator (Bard)), [Green Faith Initiate (Druid)](unknown:Green Faith Initiate (Druid)), [Green Faith Marshal (Inquisitor)](unknown:Green Faith Marshal (Inquisitor))
[Evergreen Seed Pouch](magic/wondrous:Evergreen Seed Pouch), [Warden's Cudgel](magic/wondrous:Warden's Cudgel)
[Eyes of the Wild](trait:Eyes of the Wild), [Know the Land](trait:Know the Land)
unique_summon_rules: **[Summon Nature's Ally II](spell:Summon Nature's Ally II)**: [Axe Beak](monster:Axe Beak) [Order of Wing]
**[Summon Nature's Ally II](spell:Summon Nature's Ally II)**: [Dire Badger](monster:Dire Badger) [Order of Earth]
**[Summon Nature's Ally II](spell:Summon Nature's Ally II)**: [Giant Porcupine](monster:Giant Porcupine) [Order of Earth]
**[Summon Nature's Ally IV](spell:Summon Nature's Ally IV)**: [Giant Chameleon Lizard](monster:Giant Chameleon Lizard) [Order of Fang]
**[Summon Nature's Ally IV](spell:Summon Nature's Ally IV)**: [Giant Skunk](monster:Giant Skunk) [Order of Earth]
**[Summon Nature's Ally IV](spell:Summon Nature's Ally IV)**: [Seaweed Leshy](monster:Seaweed Leshy) [Order of Leaf or Wave]
**[Summon Nature's Ally IV](spell:Summon Nature's Ally IV)**: [Giant Vulture](monster:Giant Vulture) [Order of Wing]
**[Summon Nature's Ally V](spell:Summon Nature's Ally V)**: [Emperor Cobra](monster:Emperor Cobra) [Order of Fang]
**[Summon Nature's Ally V](spell:Summon Nature's Ally V)**: [Giant Owl](monster:Giant Owl) [Order of Wing]
**[Summon Nature's Ally V](spell:Summon Nature's Ally V)**: [Giant Gar](monster:Giant Gar) [Order of Wave]
**[Summon Nature's Ally VI](spell:Summon Nature's Ally VI)**: [Shambling Mound](monster:Shambling Mound) [Order of Leaf]
**[Summon Nature's Ally VII](spell:Summon Nature's Ally VII)**: [Giant Snapping Turtle](monster:Giant Snapping Turtle) [Order of Wave]
**[Summon Nature's Ally VII](spell:Summon Nature's Ally VII)**: [Giant Anaconda](monster:Giant Anaconda) [Order of Fang]
**[Summon Nature's Ally VII](spell:Summon Nature's Ally VII)**: [Giant Flytrap](monster:Giant Flytrap) [Order of Leaf]
other_rules: No clerics of the Green Faith, domains are for Druids. The Green Faith is not headed by a deity, but is an order that worships and gains power from nature.

heading: **nature**
details: **Areas of Concern** Air, beast, earth, fire, water
This represents a general reverence for nature, unaffiliated with the Green Faith.
